mapper.select: select * from friend_link where link_status = 1 and link_end_time >= NOW()
mapper.insert: insert into friend_link (link_name, link, link_sign, link_status, link_contacts, link_create_time, link_end_time) values (#{linkName}, #{link}, #{linkSign}, #{linkStatus}, #{linkContacts}, #{linkCreateTime}, #{linkEndTime})
